name: Slybots: Frantic Zone
description: Slybots: Frantic Zone is a dual-stick shooter reinvented with stealth mechanics. Immerse yourself in crazy 3-minute matches, be as sly as a robot and enjoy the adrenalin rush of the most frantic zone youâ€™ve ever seen.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP 32bit Processor: Core 2 Duo or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DX9 / Shader Model 2.0 or newer graphics card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1 64bit Processor: Intel iSeries 2rd gen or newer Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel Integrated graphics from 3rd gen or newer (HD4400/HD4600) / 2013 dedicated graphics card DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 300 MB available space
